content.rendered:
PROJECT DESCRIPTION
  • This project involved the procurement, coordination, installation and management of the civil, mechanical and electrical engineering works for the Influent Pumping Station Facility comprising three 70m deep shafts and connecting underground 4.3m diameter pressure pipelines, Effluent Junction Chamber, East and West Electrical Substations and other ancillary buildings.
  • The station is part of PUB’s S$2 billion state-of-the-art Deep Tunnel Sewerage System (DTSS), which will become Asia’s most advanced water reclamation plant and one of the world’s most extensive DTSS.
CLIENT

Public Utilities Board (PUB)

LOCATION

Changi, Singapore

COMPLETION YEAR

2007

AWARDS
  • BCA Award for Construction Excellence, Civil Engineering Projects Category, 2008
